channel.title: How to put number of players online on my server right on my forum?
channel.description:
Some forum have: "There are currently 134 players online!". I want to have this to. How can I make it ? If you know any good tutorial for this, post. My forum base is Invisionfree.
Thanks.

item.title: How to put number of players online on my server right on my forum?
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:9, topic:296071”]I’m not really that great with this stuff, but i’ve been using 000webhost, and for the forums i’m using smf 1.1.10.

it’s pretty easy to set up also.[/quote]
Yup, i use either 0fee’s or 000webhost, but 0fee’s requires a gmail account instead of hotmail, yahoo, etc…

Read full topic
item.source: How to put number of players online on my server right on my forum?

item.source: How to put number of players online on my server right on my forum?

item.title: How to put number of players online on my server right on my forum?
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

Maximum ZxZ:

I can’t upload files to my forum because I don’t have the files. Invisionfree forums = don’t need to download files and upload it. That’s the problem, I need to do it without upload files. Or is there a possibility to upload files on my forum either if I don’t have the files ?

You need mySQL, if you use free forums then there’s no point in trying; however you can download smf files, use google to find them, and you can go to 0fees.net and they host php files, etc… and it’s all free.

Read full topic
